body_html:
Looks like no more hiding shameful mistakes like math.ops.. :P
But I see your point.

Still trying to figure out how to use and test the gradient operations. If
someone has urgent need for this, feel free to pick it up. Otherwise I'll
keep trying tomorrow night.

On Mon, Aug 15, 2016 at 10:30 AM, Geoffrey Irving notifications@github.com
wrote:

By the way: add new commits rather than overwriting old commits, since it
makes it easier to incrementally review.

—

body:
Looks like no more hiding shameful mistakes like math.ops..  :P
But I see your point.

Still trying to figure out how to use and test the gradient operations.  If
someone has urgent need for this, feel free to pick it up.  Otherwise I'll
keep trying tomorrow night.
